title: Cozy and Comfy Home Located by the Waterfront!
map_address: 6754 Lake Washington Boulevard Northeast near c-11
posting_body: ['Elegant lakeside living with unrivaled beauty steps from the shores of Marsh Park on Lake Washington!', 'Pleasant Bay', 'Welcome Home', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', '6750-6756 Lake Washington Blvd NE, Kirkland, WA, 98033', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '6754 Lake WA Blvd NE', 'Apt Number:', 'B14', 'Sq.', 'Ft.:', '972 sqft', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Baths:', '1', 'Half Baths:', '1', 'Monthly Rent:', '$2592', 'Special:', '$100 off 1st months rent', 'Deposit:', '$350', 'Available:', '3/21', 'About This Specific Apartment Home:', 'Ground floor two bedroom with updated interior including LED lighting, stainless steel kitchen appliances and 2" faux wood blinds.', 'Enjoy sunsets from Marsh Park, just across the street, and take a 10 minute stroll along the waterfront to downtown Kirkland.', 'Just a few blocks to the Kirkland Google campus, short commute to Microsoft Redmond Campus - or downtown Seattle via 520 for many other major employers in the area.', "Pleasant Bay is just a short walk to downtown Kirkland where you can enjoy some of the Pacific Northwest's finest dining; shop in one of the many fantastic boutiques or take in an evening at the Kirkland Performance Arts Center.", "Summertime brings the Farmer's Market with produce, arts and crafts and enjoy free outdoor movies at Marina Park on the waterfront.", 'Enjoy summer evenings by taking a dip in Lake Washington, or sit on the dock at Marsh Park and watch the fabulous sunsets… all just steps from your front door.', 'Driving is a breeze with easy access to I-405 and Hwy 520 to downtown Seattle.', 'With a Walk Score of 72, you can easily walk or bike anywhere you need to go, and a Metro bus stop is within walking distance should you choose to take a bus to work, or downtown Seattle.', "Our commitment to excellence in service at all times, our diligence in anticipating and exceeding our resident's wishes and expectations provide an extraordinary living experience at Pleasant Bay!", 'Features', '- •\tLuxury stainless steel kitchen appliances', '- •\tOne, reserved covered parking space at no charge', '- •\tBoat/Trailer storage available for easy access to the lake', '- •\tDesigner accent walls and crown molding', '- •\tNew wood cabinetry with soft-closures*', '- •\tLED lighting*', '- •\tFull, front-load high-end washer and dryer', '- •\tBrushed nickel hardware', '- •\tQuartz or granite counters*', '* in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Vacation and travel coverage: mail collection, security checks', '- Fax, copy and scanning services', '- Package Delivery', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and cats are welcome residents.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Wednesday & Friday:9:00AM-5:30PM', 'Tuesday & Thursday 10:00AM-5:30PM', 'Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.', "If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.", 'Please contact our leasing team with any questions.', 's0j267PXVF']
